questions.text: Do you already have a name for your startup, or are you open to suggestions?
What is your startup’s mission or overarching purpose?
Do you have a logo or tagline in mind? If not, do you have specific style preferences?
What core problem or unmet need does your startup address?
Why is this problem pressing or urgent for the people experiencing it?
What inspired you to tackle this specific problem?
Who is your target audience or ideal customer? (Demographics, behaviors, etc.)
How big is your potential market, and have you identified any secondary segments?
How have you—or how do you plan to—validate that these customers need your solution?
Can you describe how your product or service works at a high level?
Which features are essential to your MVP (Minimum Viable Product)?
What additional features or expansions do you foresee down the line?
Who are your main competitors or alternatives in the market?
What differentiates your solution from competitors’ offerings?
Are there any key trends or shifts in the market that could help or hinder your growth?
How do you plan to make money (subscription, one-time purchase, commissions, etc.)?
Do you anticipate multiple revenue streams (partnerships, add-ons, licensing, etc.)?
How will you determine the right pricing model for your target customers?
How do you plan to acquire your first customers (marketing channels, partnerships, etc.)?
What’s your plan for keeping users engaged and ensuring they come back?
Once you have initial traction, how do you plan to scale (geographically, new features, etc.)?
Who is on your core team, and what are their roles and expertise?
Are there any critical roles or skill sets missing that you need to fill?
Are you seeking partnerships with any organizations or individuals that could help accelerate growth?
Are you bootstrapped, pre-seed, seed, or elsewhere in the funding journey?
How much capital do you need to reach your next major milestones, and for what uses?
Do you have short- or long-term revenue/profitability forecasts?
What is the development timeline for your MVP and subsequent feature releases?
What are the biggest potential obstacles (technical, regulatory, market acceptance, etc.)?
How do you define success (e.g., market share, exit strategy, IPO, sustainable growth)?
